creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small woodblock printed book; text pages alternating with images of various insects on plants and vegetables; toad eyeing a fly near back; cover has pattern of small brown and blue flowers with tiny brown spots
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Selected Insects from Close at Hand (Chūka senzen 肘下選蠕)
